biotools.summary: Software that finds and displays approximate tandem repeats (ATR) in DNA sequences. An approximate tandem repeat (ATR) in a genomic sequence is a string of nucleotides repeated consecutively at least twice with some small differences between the repeated copies.

bioschemas.name: ATRHunter
bioschemas.summary: Software that finds and displays approximate tandem repeats (ATR) in DNA sequences. An approximate tandem repeat (ATR) in a genomic sequence is a string of nucleotides repeated consecutively at least twice with some small differences between the repeated copies.
